title: 90’s Adventure Bear
description: Join 90’s Adventure Bear and his gang, Zip Skyboard, Yuk-Yuk the orangutan, Goober the fruit bat, and Jump-Kick the lemur, as they work together to thwart the disastrous Major Manslaughter. Treachery and magic and romance and flying objects!
altHero: cartoon bear wearing a safari hat
alt2: Major Manslaughter, a weasle standing on a tank
alt3: 90’s Adventure Bear pointing at a floating, flaming skull
alt4: the gang walking along a ledge with red lava below
